description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Technical Support Point (pre-paid) is a blended hour, included in your subscription plan, that consists of Application Support Specialist time. It can be used for integration, operation and features-related queries.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Professional Service Point is a blended hour included into your subscription plan, which may consist of the time of various specialists, whether it is the time of a business analyst, architect, lead automation engineer, DevOps (System Engineer) or performance engineer. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It can be used for various purposes related to ReportPortal installation, configuration, integration, customization, feature implementation, TAF updates, test case implementation, etc.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Enjoy a full-year access to all the benefits offered in our packages, assuring you of uninterrupted service throughout the year.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
